Class MainGameFrame

java.lang.Object

                      ch.hszt.connectfour.gui.MainGameFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameFrame, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainGameFrame
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements GameFrame

Represents the frame presenting the game board allowing direct user interaction.

Version:
1.0, 31.10.2011
Author:
Markus Vetsch
